sign_in_page_description: Log in to your account on {{appName}} to unlock exclusive member-only deals, track your orders, and enjoy special discounts on your favorite products.
sign_up_page_description: Join {{appName}} today to unlock exclusive member-only discounts, track your orders, save your favorites, and get personalized shopping recommendations. Sign up now and don't miss out!
forgot_password_page_description: Reset your password for {{appName}}. Enter your email to receive instructions and regain access to your account quickly and securely.
